CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1958, pg. A15 reads: "Fun At Graduation Prom - These gay Herron Hill Junior High School students appear to be having one grand time at their graduation prom held in school gym. Dancing ranged from waltzing and a grand march to "the slop," which some just had to do in order to complete a fun-packed evening.  Walt Harper's smart combo furnished the music. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young men, and young women, including Barbara Payne facing away and wearing sleeveless dress with diamond patterned crinoline skirt, dancing to Walt Harper's band, in gymnasium, for Herron Junior High School graduation prom
